reviews.review_msg: Getting mixed up in examples constantly to asking questions that were nonsensical, Gopolang did it all. Glad I'll never be having him again.
Not going to Professor Molabeng's lectures was the right decision.
NEVER TAKE THIS MAN AGAIN I ALMOST LOST MY HAIR. HE LITERALLY IS SATAN AND I WILL NOT EVER LOOK AT THIS MAN THE SAME. I HATED THIS SO MUCH SAVE YOURSELF.

Difficult class and he did not make it any easier to understand, he often made mistakes in lectures. His exams were not the most difficult but his way of explaining made it very hard to understand, it was like he was speaking in only math terms and made little effort to elaborate. Not the worst prof I've had by a long shot but not great either.
He tries his best to explain and offers a lot of help outside of class, but his test are a bit over complicated. Just make sure to study A LOT
